sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_comm_management.CommunicationManagementUtilAjaxSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CommunicationManagementUtilAjaxSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CommunicationManagementUtilAjaxSNC = Class.create();
CommunicationManagementUtilAjaxSNC.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getCommTaskSourceTable: function() {
		var sys_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_comm_task');
		var gr = new GlideRecord(CommunicationManagementUtil.prototype.TABLES.COMM_TASK);
		if (gr.get(sys_id) && gr.canRead() && gr.comm_plan && gr.comm_plan.canRead()) {
			if (gr.comm_plan.getRefRecord().getRecordClassName() == CommunicationManagementUtil.prototype.TABLES.INCIDENT_ALERT)
				return CommunicationManagementUtil.prototype.TABLES.INCIDENT;
			if (gr.comm_plan.source && gr.comm_plan.source.getRefRecord().getRecordClassName())
				return gr.comm_plan.source.getRefRecord().getRecordClassName();
		}
	}
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-02-17 06:54:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2c2aaf8a73581300cab854eb7df6a7e0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CommunicationManagementUtilAjaxSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Task Communications Management" source="sn_comm_management">8dfe92d95373030029200ef5d5dc348a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Task Communications Management">8dfe92d95373030029200ef5d5dc348a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2c2aaf8a73581300cab854eb7df6a7e0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-04-29 11:03:26</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
